description: This file defines the ActivitiesFragment class in an Android app, responsible for displaying and managing daily activity logs such as steps and distance. It includes UI setup, menu handling, dialog presentation for adding new activities, and interactions with the ActivityRepository to fetch and update data.

classes.name: ActivitiesFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays a list of daily activity entries and provides UI for adding new activities via dialogs. Manages interaction with the ActivityRepository and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up the repository, and enables options menu.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu resource to add menu items.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selection, triggering dialog display when 'add' action is chosen.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, initializes RecyclerView, and sets its adapter.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Updates the adapter with the latest data when the fragment resumes.

methods.name: showAddDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog for user input to add a new activity entry, updating the repository and UI upon saving.
